content.raw: The val_description package has been released and uploaded, so if you `apt-get update && apt-get upgrade` you should see a new one downloaded. Also, I pointed the link in the install instructions to the updated controller that should allow the neck and lower arms to move. I'm going to mark this resolved since I think it is now fixed, but please re-open if you have any problems.
content.html: The val_description package has been released and uploaded, so if you apt-get update && apt-get upgrade you should see a new one downloaded.
